Class FormWithFiles

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.util.WrapperList<E>
      org.restlet.util.Series<Parameter>
          org.restlet.data.Form
              com.threecrickets.prudence.util.FormWithFiles
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Parameter>, Collection<Parameter>, List<Parameter>
public class FormWithFiles
extends Form

A form that can parse MediaType.MULTIPART_FORM_DATA entities by accepting file uploads. Files will appear as parameters of type FileParameter.

Author:
Tal Liron
